metadata.title: USN-6161-2 -- .NET regression
metadata.description: USN-6161-1 fixed vulnerabilities in .NET. The update introduced a regression with regards to how the runtime imported X.509 certificates. This update fixes the problem.  We apologize for the inconvenience.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that .NET did not properly enforce certain  restrictions when deserializing a DataSet or DataTable from  XML. An attacker could possibly use this issue to elevate their  privileges. (CVE-2023-24936)   Kevin Jones discovered that .NET did not properly handle the  AIA fetching process for X.509 client certificates. An attacker  could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  (CVE-2023-29331)   Kalle Niemitalo discovered that the .NET package manager,  NuGet, was susceptible to a potential race condition. An  attacker could possibly use this issue to perform remote  code execution. (CVE-2023-29337)   Tom Deseyn discovered that .NET did not properly process certain  arguments when extracting the contents of a tar file. An attacker  could possibly use this issue to elevate their privileges. This  issue only affected the dotnet7 package. (CVE-2023-32032)   It was discovered that .NET did not properly handle memory in  certain circumstances. An attacker could possibly use this issue  to cause a denial of service or perform remote code execution.  (CVE-2023-33128)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6161-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  dotnet-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.119-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 aspnetcore-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.119-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet-hostfxr-6.0 - 6.0.119-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet-apphost-pack-6.0 - 6.0.119-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet-host - 6.0.119-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet-sdk-6.0-source-built-artifacts - 6.0.119-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 aspnetcore-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.119-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet-sdk-6.0 - 6.0.119-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet6 - 6.0.119-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet-templates-6.0 - 6.0.119-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1 - 6.0.119-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.119-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 No subscription required  netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1-7.0 - 7.0.108-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet-hostfxr-7.0 - 7.0.108-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet-apphost-pack-7.0 - 7.0.108-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 aspnetcore-targeting-pack-7.0 - 7.0.108-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 aspnetcore-runtime-7.0 - 7.0.108-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet-templates-7.0 - 7.0.108-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet-targeting-pack-7.0 - 7.0.108-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet-sdk-7.0 - 7.0.108-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet7 - 7.0.108-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet-sdk-7.0-source-built-artifacts - 7.0.108-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet-runtime-7.0 - 7.0.108-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 dotnet-host-7.0 - 7.0.108-0ubuntu1~23.04.1 No subscription required
